title: Prosecuting Police Shootings + Reinstating The Brontosaurus And Studying The Smithsonian's Dinosaurs
teaser: PROSECUTING POLICE SHOOTINGS: Kojo chats with Washington Post reporter Kimberly Kindy, part of a team that recently analyzed thousands of police shootings that have taken place during the past decade. (13 min.) REINSTATING THE BRONTOSAURUS AND STUDYING THE SMITHSONIAN'S DINOSAURS: A new study says the Brontosaurus is in fact its own category of dinosaur--despite a century-old decision to classify it as an Apatosaurus. We explore new research on classifying dinosaurs, including the ones in the Smithsonian's collection. (36 min.)
